Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
